messages.content: Could you please assist me by answering the following query: Who had an 80s No 1 hit with Hold On To The Nights? Your thorough and precise response would be greatly appreciated.

response: Certainly! The 1980s No. 1 hit "Hold On to the Nights" was performed by **Richard Marx**. The song reached number one on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in July 1988. It was the fourth single from his self-titled debut album, "Richard Marx." This ballad became one of his signature songs and helped establish him as a prominent pop-rock artist in the late 1980s.
